sense1_meaning: to put food into the mouth and swallow
sense1_example: Nagkakan kami subagong aga.||We ate this morning.
May nahiling akong nagdadalagan na ikos.||I saw a cat running.
sense2_example: Matibay siyang magpadalagan nin negosyo.||She's good at running a business.

sense1_meaning: a building for people to live in
sense1_example: Ini an samuyang harong.||This is our house.
Dakula an harong.||The house is big.
